summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 4664, entitled "An Ordinance to license and regulate the business of dealing in second hand goods, and providing penalties for the violation thereof", approved November 15, 1897, and Ordinance No. 4757, entitled "An Ordinance authorizing persons holding licenses to engage in business as second hand dealers under Ordinance No. 4664 to continue to do business under such license", approved January 20, 1898, supplemental to Ordinance No. 4664.
